trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> to stop executing and returns control back to the calling method.
The Halt action is similar to a break command, although it ends the execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.
The Halt action will stop execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> when all the actions in the same action block have finished executing.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"></xref> class.
Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
Determines whether two object instances are equal.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
`true` if the objects are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
context is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Returns the hash code for this instance.
The hash code for this instance.
Returns the fields and properties updated by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
A list of the fields and properties changed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
Since <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"></xref> does not have parameters, the return value will always be an empty list.
Returns the string "Halt".
The string "Halt".
Returns true, no validation is performed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
Always returns `true`.
